steps.name: Test
steps.run: CGO_ENABLED=1 gotestsum --junitfile tmp/test-results/test.xml --raw-command -- go test -json -tags=detectors -timeout=15m $(go list ./... | pkg/detectors)

steps.name: Upload test results to BuildPulse for flaky test detection
